intro: Psychotria murmurensis, commonly known as the murmur psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in primary and secondary forests. The plant contains various alkaloids, which have been of interest in ethnobotanical and pharmacological studies.
